title: Avantika jaiswal
author: Avantika jaiswal
content: Can anyone earn Free Bitcoin Without Investing in it.

comments.author: Welsh
comments.body: Without investing anything in it? No. You'll either need a start capital or you'll need time, and skills. You aren't going to get anything that's worth anything in this world for free. At least, not a currency, maybe some old furniture. If you want to mine, you need money to invest. If you want to have a job, you'll need to invest your time, and whatever skills might be necessary. If you want to earn Bitcoin passively, then you either mine or you create something which can earn you it passively. None of that comes free. Most users invest a small amount of money, and benefit from it if Bitcoin goes up. However, a lot of users here have invested their time in building up a reputation, and either building a service or advertising. Other than that, the options are limited, but they all require time or money.

comments.body: You can earn Bitcoin without investing fiat in it, but that does not classify as free bitcoins.Monetary investments is not the only form of investments; Time is a valuable capital and was what people invested in the early days through faucets, which are relatively not valuable now.Building skills is a good way to learn, and with Bitcoin being a means of receiving payment, it can be used to receive payment for whatever skills you are marketing; this is not free earnings.Even airdrops of shitcoin are not gotten for free, as you have to follow some social media accounts or like a few posts before you can earn them.
